file_content.text: Let's get everyone out of here!
Let's get out of here. This place is about to blow.
What--? You brought my field disruptors! Give me two seconds, and I will give you a thanks like you've never seen.
How did you get in here? How did you even know to come?
I can say honestly there is no one I would rather be looking at right now.
You said you wanted to shoot Imperials, but there are easier ways to ask a girl out.
[Flirt] You up for our date?
Ah, but for a girl like you, I had to stand out from the crowd.
Are you sure we can't leave this guy here?
Take one of these. We can each start busting cages. I'll make sure everyone we free gets safely back to the base.
Did Sixer send you? I swear that droid's the best friend I've got.
I like to do the right thing every now and then. Keeps 'em guessing.
Glad to help.
Just how close are you two?
That's a little creepy.
Field disruptors first, thanks later.
We don't have much time.
Right. Let's each take one of these and start busting cages.
Free as many as you can, and I'll take charge of getting everyone safely to the base.
Call me when you're done. We should find time to do this properly--you know, food, candlelight....
No. Uh-uh. No candles. She's, uh, allergic.
Good luck, Captain.
Call me once you've found somewhere to lie low.
Captain? Is that you?
